title: defer recover() doesn't work
body:
When trying to solve Dave Chaney's popquiz https://twitter.com/davecheney/status/696883109124403200 I saw that this doesn't work:
http://play.golang.org/p/Oc2koIXkL7
but this does:
http://play.golang.org/p/0HzIJgVRtP

It seems counter intuitive that the first doesn't work, though it's technically allowed by the spec (as the spec always talks about recover being called "by a deferred function".
